reviewText: I remember watching this as a kid.  I feel that the show still holds up and as an adult is still a ton of fun.  I wish this would come to instant download.

This is such a great cartoon!  I LOVED it when it was on, I'd get up at 6 on a Saturday to watch it!  Unfortunately, the time slot killed its ratings and it never really got off the ground.  It was phenomenal for its 3-D animation and well-crafted characters.  LOVE IT!
